thread.title: Poor service, good location
thread.title_full: Poor service, good location - Review of New York Hilton Midtown, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: SiddharthVasudevan
title: Poor service, good location
text: Stayed here for 3 nights. During my stay, the housekeeping of the room was not even done once! The digital key on my phone did not work even after getting it sorted at the lobby. Breakfast spread is average. Rooms are well appointed and location is excellent and hence I came back to stay here.
